title: Looking for Jimmy Collins Fan Craze
author: swk473

posts.post_title: Looking for Jimmy Collins Fan Craze
posts.post_content:
Hello all,

New to posting these boards but have been a guest for a bit on and off.

Trying to add a couple early Boston Red Sox cards to my my Sox collection.

1904/06 Fan Craze Jimmy Collins
1904/06 Fan Craze Cy Young

1909 E90-1 American Caramel Cy Young

Condition does not matter but prefer a graded specimen.

Drop a note if you have one to sell or trade. Been a collector for 35 years--wow can't believe I just said that. Thank you!
Still looking for a graded Fan Craze Jimmy Collins if one is looking to sell. Drop me a message and I'll get back to you—thanks!
